spatial_accuracy.notes: General layout is preserved, but the utility area and kitchen have been reinterpreted; the exterior wall of the utility area lacks the structural gap shown in the plan. Window placements on the facade are somewhat generic compared to the specific plan openings.

structural_fidelity.notes: The model successfully uses a cutaway view on a dark background. However, it hallucinated an entirely new room/separate kitchen unit in the foreground right (adjacent to the foyer) which does not exist in the floor plan. Wall thicknesses and exterior detailing vary from the source.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture mapping is remarkably high, matching the dining table, sofa arrangement, and bed orientations correctly. Scaling is consistent with the room dimensions.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Uses a clean isometric orthographic perspective. While lighting is soft, some surfaces exhibit textures (wood grain, marble-like patterns) which slightly deviates from a strict 'no texture' low-poly mandate.

detected_errors.description: Hallucinated an additional enclosed kitchen/room structure near the entrance foyer not present in the 2D plan.
The 'Utility' balcony area has been transformed into a fully enclosed room with standard windows.
Presence of textures on floor and kitchen counters violates the strict 'no textures/flat colors only' constraint.
